answers.answer: at 20 weeks nd some days i was measuring a week ahead... i heard its normal to measure up to 2 weeks ahead or behind cuz it juss depends how babys growing... nd i guess if its more than 2 weeks in either direction is wen they start to worry... well not worry but thats wen they actually start to like figure out why... i think yur fine
I hope ur right, and I hope im not measuring 3 wks ahead in a 1 wk ½. That's my next appt.
if yu are they will prolly give yu an ultrasound to see how big baby is... nd then go from there
if you have diabetes your baby will measure bigger
I hope not as much as I wana see my baby girl I hope everything goes back 2 normal. Or at least just measure those 2 wks and not bigger.
Nope I don't have diabetes I am anemic though can that make a difference 2?

They told me I'm measuring big so I'm getting a sweep next week, but my bubbah sits really far forward. Measuring two weeks either side of how far along u are is normal. If it goes beyond that they will keep an eye on you to make sure everything is ok and probably send you for anotherscan.

I'm 32 weeks measuring 39 happened 2 times to me. It can be lots of things diabetes to much fluid (amniotic) or like me baby having a growth spirt and stretching. They usually do a ultrasound if u are more then 3 weeks ahead
Wow thanks ladies it's helpfull to get all types od answers...! I really appreciate it cause it gives me peace of mind..!

question: What could be some reasons 4 measuring bigger all of a sudden after all was measuring on time 2 wks ago? I am 30+3 and measuring 32+3, well 2 wks ahead..! Have any of you been through this?
title: measuring big!
